message: Let's start with a fair split.  I'm willing to give you 40%.
That offer was too low for me, Alice.  I'm willing to take 60% considering the money devalues quickly for you. It's a win-win!
I'm willing to give you 45% this time, Bob.  Let's not let the inflation eat away at our gains any further.  We can both walk away with a decent share.
